uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data

Class Print

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data.Print
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Print
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Sends a file (passed as a parameter) to the host system's printer spooler allowing the file to be printed. Wrapped in a dedicated thread to enforce robustness and prevent "locking up" of the GUI.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) java.io.File fileToPrint
      The file to be sent to the printer
      (package private) java.awt.Desktop printDesktop
      The the host system environment

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Print(java.io.File fileToPrint)
      Instantiates a new Print object, and defines the path name of the file that is to be printed.
